channel.title: Who Looks at Ban Apeals?
channel.description:
Well ive had alot of acounts banned for macroing and ive attempted to apeal every one but always get denied any idea if actual people look at ban apeals or if its done by an automated process?
Also if you have had any acounts apealed for macroing if you can rember how you got it apealed then post it here so all can learn, and hopefully save some acounts :)

item.title: Who Looks at Ban Apeals?
item.dc:creator: @poopy4231 poopy4231
item.description:
@poopy4231 wrote:

its defintaly not automated, or else i would of gotten my last chance appeal back… it took from november 2nd to december 6th for my appeal to be processed

i do believe that some are automated

Read full topic

item.title: Who Looks at Ban Apeals?
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

The suicide trick didnt work for me

And i was apparently banned for bad language, when the script i was running had no auto-talker ROFL

The faggots could provide any evidence, but still wont unbann me.

Read full topic

item.title: Who Looks at Ban Apeals?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Yeah, their system is entirely automated. However, when you try things like this

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:11, topic:33728”]Dear Jagex:

I scammed some guy,
I shouldn’tve
Gimme my account back.
I wont be bad no more.
Your game doesn’t suck.

Sincerely the person who did that thing.[/quote]

You have to be careful, because their program sometimes breaks down when proccessing appeals. If it isn’t able to ‘deny’ it, which is the default, the CS team has to restart it and they sometimes look at the appeal that caused the breakdown.

Read full topic

1 dum taco:

the runescape customer suport team is a myth…

@O_M_F_G wrote:

they never look at it-all automaited

item.title: Who Looks at Ban Apeals?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

The RuneScape appeal system is automated, and there are certain paragraph structures it looks for to unban you.

Javanotrecognized said this a while back and I have had some successfully appeals with it

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:11, topic:33728”]Dear Jagex:

I scammed some guy,
I shouldn’tve
Gimme my account back.
I wont be bad no more.
Your game doesn’t suck.

Sincerely the person who did that thing.[/quote]

Try it, but change it to what your offense is. Hope I helped

Read full topic
